ComicInfo.Title: A Storm of Vengeance [Carnival of Death Part II]
ComicInfo.Series: Ghost Rider / Blaze: Spirits of Vengeance
ComicInfo.Summary: A Storm of Vengeance [Carnival of Death Part II]: Vengeance sees Steel Wind trying to kill the Ghost Rider and he attempts to stop her and the other demons so that he can have his revenge on Ghost Rider instead. During the fight Steel Wind kills Eli, who gives John an envelope before he dies. Vengeance attacks the Ghost Rider thinking that he is Zarathos. Kody is shown to be some kind of demon when Clara is taken and Miranda manifests some kind of power that seems to defeat the remaining demons. Centerius is revealed as Styge.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-22 12:11:21. [CVDB66529] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:44:29. [Issue ID 85602]
ComicInfo.Characters: Johnny Blaze,Ghost Rider [Danny Ketch],Eli (death),Wolf,Miranda,Timmy Woods (death?),Steel Wind,Kody,Vengeance,Clara
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
